dia.str: Luckily for you none of them was harmed. You cannot speak of this to anyone. They are only children and they are safe down there.
I found them. Someone else might find them too.
You are right. I have to take additional precautions. Max told me you were kind with them. Who are you?
I'm on a mission for the warriors' guild.
'Morven stares at you and quickly casts a spell and disappears'
